metadata.title: CVE-2023-25565 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GSS-NTLMSSP is a mechglue plugin for the GSSAPI library that implementsNTLM authentication. Prior to version 1.2.0, an incorrect free whendecoding target information can trigger a denial of service. The errorcondition incorrectly assumes the `cb` and `sh` buffers contain a copy ofthe data that needs to be freed. However, that is not the case. Thisvulnerability can be triggered via the main `gss_accept_sec_context` entrypoint. This will likely trigger an assertion failure in `free`, causing adenial-of-service. This issue is fixed in version 1.2.0.

criterions.comment: gss-ntlmssp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
